title: Asia's Wow! Courses
headline: Asia's Wow! Courses
description: Asia is the hottest destination for new golf courses. As we tip our hat to this past week’s CIMB Classic in Malaysia and the ongoing WGC-HSBC Champions in China, here are Asia’s greatest Wow! courses, like Stoneforest's Yufeng Ridge.
body: Asia is the hottest destination for new golf courses. As we tip our hat to this past week’s CIMB Classic in Malaysia and the ongoing WGC-HSBC Champions in China, here are Asia’s greatest Wow! courses, like Stoneforest's Yufeng Ridge.
